Translations.Text: When ni dir al angxel, Fal prostrate Adam ili fal prostrate Satan. Li dir mi prostrate 1 Vi Shall kre kot
Li dir Ekde Vi honor him me Vi respite me Tag Resurrection mi posed all his descendants a few
Li dir Tiam ir; vi those sekv vi end Infer your requital; equitable requital
Vi entice them your vocx mobilize all your forces all your hom them akci en their mon infan promes them! Anything diabl promes est ne plur than iluzi
As por My servants vi ne hav potenc them. Your Lord suffices advokat
Your Lord est Unu kauxz sxip float ocean ke vi streb His bounties! Li est Merciful towards vi
Vi aflikt mar vi forges your idols sincerely implore Him sol. as baldaux as Li sav vi bord vi revert Ja human est est unappreciative
Vi garanti ke Li hav ne kauxz land bord glut vi? Aux ke Li ne send vi tempest tiam vi ne trov protector
Vi garanti Li hav ne return vi mar re tiam send vi sxtorm dron vi your disbelief? Once this okaz ni ne don vi another sxanc
Ni honor infan Adam proviz them rajd sur land en mar! Ni proviz por them bon provisions ni don them greater avantagx than many da our creatures
